# Groupe: `r group$name` {-}

```{r echo=FALSE}
group$students |>
  flextable::flextable() |>
  flextable::add_header_row(values = c(paste0("Moniteur: ", group$coach)), colwidths = c(2)) |>
  flextable::width(j = c(1), width = 60, unit = "mm") |>
  flextable::width(j = c(2), width = 22, unit = "mm") |> 
  flextable::theme_vanilla()
```
